how is this even possible is it an

ridiculous idea because it's using
completely the wrong tool for the job
excavators use hydraulics to transmit
power from a pump to the head of the
claw hydraulics use a incompressible
fluid such as oil this means that if you
apply pressure at one end that can't be
squeezed and the pressure is transferred
to somewhere else in the system if you
look at the excavator you can see in
tubes in some places and much wider
Pistons in others by pushing in where
it's thin you don't have to use as much
force that pressure though is the same
at the other end it is a bigger area and
that gives you a much bigger force that
means that this excavator is really
great and making big powerful movements
but it's really hard to make these
really small movements and pick up these

monster machine with such skill and
dexterity when you play with toy blocks
you're getting constant feedback from
your touch the driver of the excavator
though doesn't get that he's just

he has to try and look to see what's
happening and adjust accordingly the one

possible is he's building on a padded
